scripts.ncs:dev: npm run prisma:generate && npm run tsx:dev
scripts.ncs:test: dotenvx run -f compose.test.env -- docker compose -f compose.test.yml up -d --pull always --force-recreate -V && docker container exec -it node-test bash -c 'npm run prisma:db:push && npm run vitest' && dotenvx run -f compose.test.env -- docker compose -f compose.test.yml down && docker system prune -af --volumes
scripts.actions:test: dotenvx run -f compose.test.env -- docker compose -f compose.test.yml up -d --pull always --force-recreate -V && dotenvx run -f compose.test.env -- docker compose -f compose.test.yml exec node bash -c 'npm run prisma:db:push && npm run vitest'
scripts.prisma:db:push: dotenvx run -f prisma.${NCS_ENV}.env -- prisma db push
scripts.tsx:dev: dotenvx run -f prisma.dev.env -- tsx watch app/main.ts
